author: bluk
msg: Reduce logging in error path case
in debug mode but in normal mode a simpler
info message is logged.  Exception still thrown
to container and in Geronim/Tomcat this
means the stack trace is still printed out to
the container log outside of Wink.

author: lhazlewood
msg: Added constructors to IniRealm and IniSecurityManagerFactory to load an Ini by resource path and included accompanying tests.  Also updated the Quickstart to use this mechanism (a little easier to understand).

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2289: camel-bindy is a bit easier to use with CSV marshal as it can work on your POJO directly instead of must be wrapped in List<Map<String, Object>>.

author: mbenson
msg: let hudson updatesite be packed now
